Title: WPF Custom Window Glows
Description: Make WPF windows glow or have custom drop shadows as in Microsoft Visual Studio 2012 and onwards and Microsoft Office 2013.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

This library exposes methods that allow WPF windows to glow just like applications written by Microsoft, such as Microsoft Visual Studio 2012 and onwards, as well as Office 2013. These WPF windows do not have to have WindowStyle set to none, the methods work with whatever WPF windows.
